str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From kratos; to use strength, i.e. Seize or retain.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pleres; to make replete, i.e. to cram, level up, or to furnish, satisfy, execute, finish, verify, etc.
